name: The Empty Throne
text: Your Turn: If you have 19 or more cards in your trash, your Leader gains +1000 power. Activate: Main - You may rest this Stage and 3 of your DON!! cards: Play up to 1 black (Five Elders) type Character with a cost equal to or less than the total number of DON!! cards on your field from your hand.
